eligibility: Candidate must be a graduate from a recognized university or institution with at least 50% marks (45% for SC/ST candidates). Final year students can also apply. Detailed eligibility criteria are available on the official website.
negativeMarking: 0.25 marks deducted for each incorrect answer
examFrequency: Once a year (usually December, conducted in 3 slots)

faqs.question: What is the SNAP exam used for?
faqs.answer: SNAP is an entrance examination conducted by Symbiosis International University for admissions into the 29 MBA programmes offered at its 17 institutes.
